ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, on Zek where I play my Wizard, it is a wonderful thing that robes cannot be dropped or traded.  This also means they cannot be stolen off your
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, on Zek where I play my Wizard, it is a wonderful thing that robes
cannot be dropped or traded. This also means they cannot be stolen off your
corpse. Then again bags can be traded but not stolen. And they need to fix
that loot bug anyway.
----- Original Message -----
From: Spehar, David J <David.Spehar@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 8:04 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES


> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> Yes, this is true. I bought Sr. Apprentice robes and then tried to buy
> another color i wanted (even though Id loose money....so what). I bought
> new ones then went to sell old ones back...the merchant would give me a
> price but wouldnt buy it back. I paid for it....it wasnt a newbie food
item
> or robe...come on..we should be able to sell it.
>
> -Ziff..desirer of new robes
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:57 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES
>
>
> From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
> Isn't the robe just anoher piece of clothing???? You should be able to
> trade and/or buy them anywhere from anyone . . .
>
> 1 other thing . . . is the trip to Euridine from FREEPORT dangerous?? If
I
> stay on the road??
>
> -Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: McGraw, T. David <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:50 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES
>
>
> > From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
> >
> > The only way to find out is to be an enchanter with the Dark Elf
Illusion.
> > You can not trade robes once they have been purchased so that idea won't
> > work(unless this has changed).
> >
> > Yours,
> >
> > ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
>
>
